headline: How Citizens Financial Group's (CFG) Preferred Stock and Note Redemptions May Reshape Its Capital Structure
summary: On October 6, 2025, Citizens Financial Group eliminated its Series F Preferred Stock by filing a Certificate of Elimination after redeeming all outstanding shares, and it also announced the upcoming full redemption of its 4.3% Fixed-Rate Subordinated Notes due December 2025. These recent actions reflect the company's continued efforts to strengthen its capital base and optimize its financial structure through proactive balance sheet management. With Citizens Financial Group executing these...

headline: Citizens names commercial-banking head as McCree retires
summary: Don McCree is retiring after 10 years with the bank. Ted Swimmer, most recently the bank’s head of capital markets and advisory, has taken McCree’s former post.

raw.headline: Citizens names commercial-banking head as McCree retires
raw.summary: Don McCree is retiring after 10 years with the bank. Ted Swimmer, most recently the bank’s head of capital markets and advisory, has taken McCree’s former post.

headline: Swimmer Named Head of Commercial Banking at Citizens; McCree to Retire in March 2026
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., October 07, 2025--Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE: CFG) today announced that Ted Swimmer, head of capital markets and advisory for Citizens Commercial Banking, has been named Head of Commercial Banking, effective immediately. Swimmer succeeds Don McCree, who will remain at Citizens as Chair of Commercial Banking until his retirement at the end of March 2026.
